column4: hey dude, dan from Guadec here
do you have access to ubuntu bugzilla?  I requested an account but haven't had an email with a password
what's the issue with cpufreq applet?
it thinks my laptop is about 211232143423432423Ghz
is there a bug re no way to specify wep key in the network control panel tool thingy
it was resolved as a dup
we're waiting on our provider to give us reverse dns, can't do anything about your mail other than that
the one I entered was, but 1757 was the original, and is marked as fixed
telewest route our mail for us and their pissy exchange servers are picky
they used to run Solaris boxes + sendmail and it was all lovely, they then got swapped to MS by a new guy there and it all went to sh**
